name: Profanity Bot
description:
Made for GMC Jam 9 where the theme was "Science Gone Wrong" and the handicap was "Must not contain humans".

The geniuses at the CatBot Laboratory are in a bit of a pickle. A recent firmware update has caused many of the CatBots to become defective and start cursing like sailors. Can you sort the good robots from the bad robots?

Note: I made this game in just a few hours because I had food poisoning the entire weekend of this jam!
